You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image features a pattern that resembles a grid of differently colored squares and rectangles, specifically a light blue cross, orange squares, light green shapes that include L and T, and a single magenta square. All these forms are placed on a plain background. There's no discernible action, text, or additional objects in the image to suggest a specific context or narrative. It appears to be a static display with no indication of motion or depth.
